Key Match Events: Stephen Curry scored 16 of his 24 points in the second half and made a buzzer-beater to give the Warriors a 54-45 lead at halftime.
The Warriors' bench outscored the Wizards' bench 60-33, highlighting their depth and strength in reserves.
Post-Match Reflections: Golden State Warriors head coach Steve Kerr reached 800 career games, showing the team's consistency and experience.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Steve Kerr's milestone and the presence of Washington Commanders quarterback Jayden Daniels at the game were notable but not directly related to the game's performance.
